name: Path of Vengeance
description:
**Path of Vengeance**
by Wakeman Available on North America and South-east Asia servers. Search "path" OR "vengeance", then look for the map Path of Vengeance. **Storyline:**
During the Zerg invasion of Aiur, Dark Templar Zeratul and his company set aside their long-term disagreement with Protoss of Aiur, the Khalai, and helped them. However, the fire of hatred was still burning violently in some other individuals. Ulrezaj, the leader of a Dark Templar secret society Fist of Ulrezaj, saw the downfall of Aiur as a good opportunity for their long overdue vengeance. Their first step was to establish a primary base on Aiur under the cover of the rampaging Zerg..... **Features:**
\- Melee combat ARPG map!
\- Smooth third person view camera using WASD control.
\- Numerous hero abilities.
\- Several different minion fights and four unique boss fights! **Control:**
\- Use "W", "A", "S", "D" to control Ulrezaj's movement.
\- Use "R" and "F" to change camera views.
\- Use Num Pad "1" to "9" and "\*" to use abilities.
\- Use "1", "2" to use Healthpack and Energypack respectively.
\- Ulrezaj gains one skill point every time he gains a level. Skill points can be used to learn new spells. **General Tips:**
\- Save regularly, especially before boss fights!
\- Ulrezaj's spells are very powerful. Use them whenever you have enough energy.
\- Due to limitations of the Starcraft 2 engine, you may find Ulrezaj's movement slightly laggy. If you find this unbearable, after downloaded the map at MULTIPLAYER, switch to SINGLE PLAYER => PLAY VERSUS A.I. => Look for "Path of Vengeance" => CREATE GAME, and the movement will become lagless! **Feedback / Contact:**
Please give me feedback by replying here or through e-mail: wakemanck@hotmail.com **Note:**
The story is created by me based on background from Starcraft: Brood War bonus campaign Enslavers: Dark Vengeance. It is NOT canon, so do not ask me where to find readings for the story or argue about the validity of it!
The name Kharondis was created by me. All other names were taken from the Starcraft universe. **Video:** **Screenshots**
author: _ForgeUser290163
